descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Russell Westbrook drives and tosses a lob to Anthony Davis, who elevates to stuff down a two-handed and-1 dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Anthony Davis throws down and-1 alley-oop jam) 2021/11/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Anthony Davis throws down and-1 alley-oop jam

videos.description: Anthony Davis gets the hoop and the harm

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Anthony Davis gets the hoop and the harm) 2021/11/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Anthony Davis gets the hoop and the harm

videos.description: Jimmy Butler with the and-1 bucket

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jimmy Butler with the and-1 bucket) 2021/11/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jimmy Butler with the and-1 bucket

videos.description: P.J. Tucker elevates to grab the missed shot and slams down an emphatic two-handed slam to tie the game at 112-112 late in the fourth quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (P.J. Tucker throws down ferocious put-back slam) 2021/11/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: P.J. Tucker throws down ferocious put-back slam

videos.description: Russell Westbrook pulls up and misses the 26-foot shot to win the game as the Lakers head into overtime against the Heat.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Russ misses game-winner, game goes to OT) 2021/11/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Russ misses game-winner, game goes to OT

videos.description: Tyler Herro goes 5-for-6 from downtown as he racks up 23 points as the Heat's face off against the Lakers

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tyler Herro catches fire from deep vs. Lakers) 2021/11/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tyler Herro catches fire from deep vs. Lakers
